post.body: Just got home from work. Gonna work on new YouTube video. Hope you guys are enjoying your trip! Have a great New Year's! :)
http://twitpic.com/x5fh - Okay, that's hot!
Can't go to Chicago for my b-day cuz of weather. Gotta miss another bear night. :( Will do something local I guess. Dinner and movie for 1.
Writing a parody of Katy Perry's "I Kissed A Girl". Blame my friend Kristen for the idea.
Making myself "pretty" for upcoming youtube video. Should be done and up this Saturday or Sunday.
If today was any indication of how my year is going to go, I'm screwed. And not in the good way.
It's freezing in my room!!! Wish I had a man to keep me warm. But wish in one hand, shit in the other. See which one fills up faster.
Watching live news conference and am totally in love with our IL Lt. Gov. Pat Quinn. He hates Blago so much. :)
More political uproar. Happy New Year's Eve eve, Illinois! :-/
And Burris is 71. He's gonna croak soon, so why appoint him?
Illinois gov. Blagojevich just appointed Roland Burris to Obama's senate seat! How can he do that when Blago's under investigation?! Ugh!
YAY! The firewire port I installed on my computer last night works, too! Yes, I'm a huge dork. lol
I have sound! WOOT! And kick-ass sound at that!!!
Just installed the firewire port and sound card! YAY! Now let's hope they work... lol
On my way back to work after having 5 days off in a row. Really do not want to go back. Lol
I just found 2 packs of cigarettes and a Nestle Crunch bar in a bag I totally forgot about! Woo-hoo!
Just got a firewire port for my computer. Need it for my new camcorder. Will install tonight along with a new sound card bought last month.
I'm working on writing a new humorous essay. Needs more snark, but that's what the editing process is for.
New blog post with pics "Tacky Christmas Gifts" at http://www.rjdennis.com/blog.html
Been home for about two hours now and still missing the constantly vibrating chair.
